description: Sunrise to seaside, Discover Balasore blends coastal rhythms, temple echoes and market spice.

items.name: Chandipur Beach
items.description: One of the best tourist places in Balasore, Chandipur Beach, features a unique phenomenon. During the low tides, the water recedes up to 5 km and comes back during high tides. The receding of the tides allows visitors to walk on the seabed. The beach is ideal for a picnic, strolling along the coastline, marvelling at the alluring sunset, and collecting seashells. While ornithophiles can go for bird watching at the nearby forests, adventurers can indulge in water activities like surfing, paragliding, parasailing, and more.

items.name: Khirachora Gopinath Temple
items.description: Lying around 7.5 km from Balasore, Remuna is a temple town primarily famous for Kshirachora Gopinatha Temple. Dedicated to Lord Krishna, the temple is known for its scrumptious “Kheer” prasad or offering that entices devotees from far and wide. Embark on a spiritual journey while visiting other sacred temples in Odisha like Jagannath Temple, Goudia Radhakrishna Temple, Gargeswara Mahadeba Temple, Madhabendra Goudia Math, and more.

items.name: Kuldiha Wildlife Sanctuary
items.description: Spread across 272.75 square kilometres in the Chota Nagpur Plateau region, Kuldiha Wildlife Sanctuary is among the best tourist places in Balasore for adventurers and wildlife enthusiasts. The sanctuary is home to diverse flora and fauna, including endangered Bengal tigers, leopards, deer, Asian elephants, and various bird species. You can opt for a thrilling safari to witness the wildlife in their natural habitat and revel in the natural charm of one of the top wildlife sanctuaries in Odisha.

items.name: Padmabati Water Park
items.description: Featuring a serene location, Padmavati Water Park is the ultimate hub for families, couples, and groups of friends alike. The park features a wide range of thrilling water rides, amusing games, a 9D theatre, a horror house, and numerous other elements offering a perfect, cherishable day for all age groups. A separate kids' area also comprises splash pools, miniature rides, and more. While providing an ideal escape from the hustle and bustle of mundane life, Padmavati Water Park is a must-visit tourist place in Balasore.

items.name: Panchalingeswar Temple
items.description: The Panchalingeswar Temple is one of Balasore's most sacred places. Located near Nilagari Hills, it is dedicated to Lord Shiva and features five lingams with mystical healing properties. The lush green hills, the temple's serene ambience, and the gurgling sounds of nearby waterfalls make it a tranquil tourist spot for spiritual seekers and nature enthusiasts.

items.name: Dublagadi Sea Beach
items.description: If you are a traveller who prefers peaceful places over overcrowded tourist attractions, then head to the beautiful Dublagadi Sea Beach. Scout for a serene camping site along the Eastern Coast and make your vacation unique. The beach is tucked away in the lesser corners of Orissa, where you can have a hidden paradise for fun and relaxation. Here, you can spot birds, cook over fire, photograph, and take nature walks. Dublagadi Sea Beach is where you feel disconnected from the outer world and are in nature.

items.name: Raibania Fort
items.description: As history buffs and art lovers, you are drawn to a lesser-known fort, Rananania Fort. The ruins of watchtowers, quaint courtyards, and stone walls create a perfect backdrop to immerse oneself in the views and return to ancient history. Not many know that the fort in Balasore is considered the biggest medieval fort of Eastern India. So, step into one of the best places to visit in Balasore for a perfect historic getaway.

items.name: Emami Jagannath Temple
items.description: Step into the Emami Jagannath Temple and witness Odisha's spiritual soul. The elegant architecture, inner quietness, and divine presence make your visit worthy and memorable. Unlike other temples, this mandir is not very crowded. So, seek blessings from Lord Jagannath and have a spiritual experience at the landmark.

items.name: Talasari-Udaypur Beach
items.description: Do you dream of quiet beaches with a touch of wilderness? Talsari Beach is your calling. Its casuarina groves, calm vibes, and gentle tides will put your mind at peace and your heart filled with warmth. If you are looking for less crowded beaches to have a mesmerizing time with your partner or family, add this beach to your list.
